title: The H3 Podcast is Back! With a New Look
author: PajamaJohn
content:
Los Angeles – The H3 Podcast has finally returned from a 2 week long break, but with a new name and a fresh look.

The newly named “H3 Show” is a continuation of the H3 Podcast with a brand new set more reminiscent of a late night show, with its new desk and curtains, symbolizing a new era for the show. 

“We said, ‘you know what, hey. This hasn’t been a podcast for a very long time.’ Podcasts, they sit and they go ‘oh tell me about yourself.’ I don't fucking do that shit.” said Ethan.

Although there's a new name and look, the show is still at its core the same as it has been.

“We’re here for comedy, we’re here for laughs, and we’re here to have a good time” said Ethan.

Along with the new set, designed by the show's member Sam, Ethan has a new microphone.

AB and the crew are still mourning the loss of his friend, and fellow H3 podcast member Cameron after he departed from the show before break.

“I’m not okay, he was my bestie. He was in my favorites on my phone, right next to Lena.” said AB.

For more information and to see the rest of this episode of the H3 Show visit https://www.youtube.com/live/0lt0tTr-lj4?si=VUuVnuHR1dJnEndn
